items.label: BITMAP
items.doc: Bitmapped image type resource, used for the Bitmap SGDK engine

items.label: PALETTE
items.doc: Palette type resource, used as color input for Bitmap, Image or Sprite resource.

items.label: TILESET
items.doc: Tileset type resource can be an image or a TSX file; contains tiles data which are used by Image or Sprite resource.

items.label: TILEMAP
items.doc: Tilemap type resource, contains raw tilemap data. It can be used to draw an image or complete (but small) plane background.

items.label: MAP
items.doc: map type resource, internally contains Palette, Tileset and encoded map optimized to draw large background/plane.

items.label: IMAGE
items.doc: image type resource, internally contains Palette, Tileset and Tilemap data and can be used to draw a complete background (small)

items.label: SPRITE
items.doc: Sprite type resource, used to handle sprites with the SGDK Sprite engine.

items.label: XGM
items.doc: XGM music type resource (.vgm or .xgm file), used to play music.

items.label: XGM2
items.doc: XGM2 music type resource (.vgm or .xgm file), for use to play music with the new XGM2 Driver.

items.label: WAV
items.doc: WAV sound type resource (.wav file), used to play sample sound data.

items.label: BIN
items.doc: Any binary data file which do not need any specific conversion or processing.

items.label: BEST
items.doc: Uses Best Compresion

items.label: AUTO
items.doc: Uses Auto Compresion. BEST by default if possible

items.label: NONE
items.doc: Don't use compression

items.label: APLIB
items.doc: Use APLIB Compression (good compression ratio but slow)

items.label: FAST
items.doc: Use FAST Compression (average compression ratio but fast)

items.label: LZ4W
items.doc: Use LZ4W Compression (average compression ratio but fast)

items.label: AUTO
items.doc: Auto Timming

items.label: NTSC
items.doc: NTSC Timming

items.label: PAL
items.doc: PAL Timming

items.label: ALL
items.doc: Map Optimization ALL: find duplicate and flipped tile

items.label: DUPLICATE
items.doc: Map Optimization DUPLICATE: find duplicate only

items.label: CIRCLE
items.doc: Circle collision

items.label: BOX
items.doc: Box collision

items.label: NONE
items.doc: No collision (default)

items.label: BALANCED
items.doc: Balanced Sprite Optimization: balance between used tiles and hardware sprites (default).

items.label: TILE
items.doc: reduce the number of tiles at the expense of more hardware sprite

items.label: SPRITE
items.doc: reduce the number of hardware sprite (using bigger sprite) at the expense of more used tiles

items.label: PCM
items.doc: Single channel 8 bits signed sample driver.

items.label: 2ADPCM
items.doc: 2 channels 4 bits ADPCM sample driver.

items.label: 4PCM
items.doc: 4 channels 8 bits signed sample driver with volume support.

items.label: XGM
items.doc: XGM music with 4 channels 8 bits samples driver.

items.label: XGM2
items.doc: XGM2 new music Driver.

items.label: ALIGN
items.doc:
Align *binary* data for the *whole* resource file so you can have only ALIGN directive per resource (.res) file.
ALIGN function is useful when using bank switch for ROM larger than 4MB, it allows to avoid having a block of data crossing 2 data banks.

items.label: UNGROUP
items.doc: Using UNGROUP function allow to disable that feature, that might be useful to help in bank data separation when using the bank switch mechanism.

items.label: NONE
items.doc: no optimization (cover the whole sprite frame)

items.label: ALIGN
items.doc: align *binary* data for the whole resource file using

items.label: UNGROUP
items.doc: by default rescomp will group data export by type, using UNGROUP allow to disable that feature.

items.label: ROW
items.doc: Row ordering

items.label: COLUMN
items.doc: Column ordering

items.label: TRUE
items.doc: True value

items.label: FALSE
items.doc: False value
